commands: su ssm-user --shell bash -c 'set -o pipefail; export EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME={{EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}}; export CLUSTER_CONFIG_S3_BUCKET={{CLUSTER_CONFIG_S3_BUCKET}}; export KUBECONFIG=${HOME}/${EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}/${EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}-eks-a-cluster.kubeconfig; kubectl get secret sample-cluster-sa -n eksa-system -o jsonpath={.data.tls\\.crt} | base64 --decode' > ./${EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}-sa.pub; sudo aws s3 cp ./${EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}-sa.pub s3://${CLUSTER_CONFIG_S3_BUCKET}; rm ./${EKSA_CLUSTER_NAME}-sa.pub
